'''Vaniai''' is the [[Telerin]] word for the [[Vanyar]].
==Etymology==
The word was borrowed directly from Quenya.<ref>[[The War of the Jewels]] p.383</ref>

The [[Sundocarmë|Root]] is either [[WAN]] or [[BAN]] (see [[Vanyar]])
